title: My game keeps on crashing
body:
Tfw
My game keeps on crashing. My internet and PC is fine, so why is it crashing? I have to keep on waiting 20 minutes in the queue, and I am so damn sick of it. I am losing all of my friends cause they think I afk on purpose. League is great and all, but this is really pissing me off.
Can someone please help me fix this problem?

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail as to what error messages or behavior you see when the game crashes? Most crashes are the result of a poor connection to the server, and can be resolved by the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) most of the time, but I wanted to make sure I provided the right steps.

Thank you for replying to me, but I took a rlly long break from League. In the end, I uninstalled then reinstalled. My LoL decided to work again, and I am now a happy person :) 
Thanks again :)

Hello
i have encountered this 'bug' more than once : When i enter my game it tells me that i have disconnected at the summoning and then the game pops up and tells me it crashed so i reconnect and it keeps doing that and because of it i got a ban and right now i am trying to play but still the same thing , i cant even play to get out of the low priority queue, please riot fix this bug I am so tired of it and being put in leaver buster for something i didn't even do on purpose and i am not even using any kind of third party programs and my computer and internet are all fine

Hello, Summoner are you using any third party recording software or curse client these are well known causes to crashes at least on my end after that i would check your drivers and ensure they're updated!
